title: Counter-Strike Source UPDATES 4-EMPORiO
description:
Release Notes:
You will need our previous updates to update CS:S.

Steam Fixes:
Added Tools section to Steam UI
Fixed Japanese, Thai, and Russian characters drawing incorrectly under Win98
Fixed DoD:S showing up in the Steam monitor as downloading
Fixed HL2 preloading stuck at 89% for some users
Fixed condition causing &quot;non-zero size of m_uMallocedBlock&quot; message
